languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one round, the Officer gains the stand witness effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} использует две {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} за раунд (за исключением способностей, предоставляющих {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}), он получает эффект "наглядная демонстрация". Наглядная демонстрация: следующая способность офицера, не предоставляющая дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, применяется не только к цели, но и к самому офицеру.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Leader uses a Leader doctrine ability two times in one turn that does not grant an extra turn, they gain the look how it's done effect. Look How It's Done: the next Leader doctrine ability that does not grant an extra turn will also affect the Leader.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one round, the Officer gains the stand witness effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one round, the Officer gains the stand witness effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}在同一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中使用两次不会给予{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}的军官{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，军官本人获得{g|Encyclopedia:Witness}事必躬亲{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。 事必躬亲：如果军官职业的下个能力不会赋予目标额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}，则此效果也同样会对军官本人生效。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Officer gains the stand {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}witness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}在同一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中使用两次不会给予{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}的军官{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，军官本人获得{g|Encyclopedia:Witness}事必躬亲{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。 事必躬亲：如果军官职业的下个能力不会赋予目标额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}，则此效果也同样会对军官本人生效。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} use dos {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} de oficial que no concedan un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} en un mismo asalto, gana el efecto de Sed testigos. Sed testigos: la siguiente capacidad de arquetipo de oficial que no otorgue un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra también afectará al oficial.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one round, the Officer gains the stand witness effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el oficial use una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} de oficial dos veces en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} que no conceda un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, gana el efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}Sed testigos{/g}. Sed testigos: la siguiente capacidad de arquetipo de oficial que no otorgue un turno extra también afectará al oficial.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}が、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与えるものではない{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に2回使用すると、そのオフィサーは{g|Encyclopedia:Witness}証言者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を得る。 証言者：次に追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を与えるものではないオフィサーのタイプアビリティを使用した時、オフィサーにも効果を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Officer gains the stand {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}witness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}が、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を与えるものではない{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に2回使用すると、そのオフィサーは{g|Encyclopedia:Witness}証言者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を得る。 証言者：次に追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を与えるものではないオフィサーのタイプアビリティを使用した時、オフィサーにも効果を与える。

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} использует две {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} своего {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g} за раунд (за исключением способностей, предоставляющих {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}), он получает эффект "наглядная демонстрация". Наглядная демонстрация: следующая способность офицера, не предоставляющая дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, применяется не только к цели, но и к самому офицеру.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one round, the Officer gains the stand witness effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

traits.locale_text: Когда лидер использует какую-либо способность своей доктрины дважды за ход (за исключением предоставления дополнительного хода), он получает эффект "наглядная демонстрация". Наглядная демонстрация: следующая способность лидера, не предоставляющая дополнительный ход, применяется не только к цели, но и к самому лидеру.

Когда лидер использует какую-либо способность своей доктрины дважды за ход (за исключением предоставления дополнительного хода), он получает эффект "наглядная демонстрация". Наглядная демонстрация: следующая способность лидера, не предоставляющая дополнительный ход, применяется не только к цели, но и к самому лидеру.

languages.text: Immer, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} in einer Runde zwei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Offizier-{g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyps{/g} einsetzt, die keinen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewähren, erlangt er den Effekt Seht und staunt. Seht und staunt: Die nächste Fähigkeit des Offizier-Archetyps, die keinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewährt, wirkt sich auch auf den Offizier selbst aus.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one round, the Officer gains the stand witness effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Offizier eine Offiziers-{g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} zwei Mal im selben {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} anwendet, die keinen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewährt, erlangt er den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}Seht und staunt{/g}. Seht und staunt: Die nächste Offiziers-Doktrin-Fähigkeit, die keinen Zusatzzug gewährt, beeinflusst auch den Offizier.

Immer, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zwei {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} des Offizier-{g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyps{/g} einsetzt, die keinen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewähren, erlangt er den Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}Seht und staunt{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}{/g}. Seht und staunt: Die nächste Fähigkeit des Offizier-Archetyps, die keinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zusatzzug{/g} gewährt, wirkt sich auch auf den Offizier selbst aus.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} qui ne confère par de {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} lors d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il bénéficie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}Témoin{/g}. Témoin : la prochaine capacité d'archétype de l'officier qui ne confère pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire affecte également l'officier.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Officer gains the stand {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}witness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g}. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Leader utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de sa doctrine deux fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} qui ne confère pas de {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g}, il bénéficie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Regardez Comment C'est Fait. Regardez Comment C'est Fait : la capacité suivante de la doctrine du Leader qui ne confère pas de tour supplémentaire affecte également le Leader.

Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} qui ne confère par de {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} lors d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il bénéficie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}Témoin{/g}. Témoin : la prochaine capacité d'archétype de l'officier qui ne confère pas de {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire affecte également l'officier.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, bir rauntta {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandırmayan iki Subay {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketipi{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanırsa tanık ol etkisi kazanır. Tanık Ol: Subay'ın ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} kazandırmayan bir sonraki arketip kabiliyeti, Subay'ı da etkiler.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses two Officer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that do not grant an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in one round, the Officer gains the stand witness effect. Stand Witness: the next Officer archetype ability that does not grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} will also affect the Officer.
